file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A montage showcasing numerous fan messages and illustrations for Hoshimachi Suisei's Budokan concert.
The scene shifts to a wide view of the Nippon Budokan arena, filled with fans before the show begins. A staff announcement is heard.

subtitles.original: Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live SUPERNOVA
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei Nippon Budokan Live SUPERNOVA

subtitles.original: 「星街すいせい 日本武道館 Live “SuperNova”」にご来場いただきまして、
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for coming to "Hoshimachi Suisei Nippon Budokan Live 'SuperNova',"

subtitles.original: 誠にありがとうございます。
